title: 【无语菌の地图搬运】 不公平的游戏 —— The Unfair Games
author: 额无语
txt_content:
本帖最后由 额无语 于 2014-8-5 00:28 编辑 

这段时间放暑假，一堆作业压着，今天给大家搬运一张地图
作者说地图含生存、解密
如有人搬过就请删帖

作者说地图适用版本为1.7.x
（作者说是1.7.10 1.7.9 1.7.5 1.7.4 1.7.2 我估计就是1.7.x的意思）
截图：
















介绍：
这不公平的游戏是一个挑战，取决于你，不同类型的挑战不会让你感到无聊。什么不公平的游戏，实际上，它是一套的挑战，在每一个挑战中，你会找到一个特别的羊毛来完成纪念碑里面的内容，挑战包括拼图，PVE，生存，跑酷等。

地图特征：
教程，向您展示它是如何工作的系统简单的拼图房间：你必须通过6个房间，都有不同的主题难题：你的房间已经通过5个房间，都有不同的主题，它们比别的更难眼球：用眼看到槽壁然后选择正确的项目，之后，门会打开，你必须找到自己的方式舞台上的僵尸：战斗，除非有门才会维持生存，并且有很多道具，它可以多人游戏更好地生存：你需要完成7个目标：收获32个西瓜/南瓜/仙人掌，金子10个，20个铁，25个煤和钻石盔甲，完成每一个目标后都会宣布，羊毛会被储存在你的房子，在你完成所有的目标后翻译可能有问题 还请大家指出
视频搬不过来 请大家去原帖观看 无需翻墙
如何安装地图：
下载地图。
提取地图的文件。
打开运行，输入%appdata%。
打开 .minecraft/saves 文件夹。
拖动地图文件到那里。
打开游戏。
玩的愉快！
下载：
网盘下载：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1ntzB8cp
原帖给出的下载地址：http://www.dl4.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1401156592
http://www.dl3.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1401183845最后原文：The Unfair Games Map 1.7.10/1.7.9/1.7.2Compatible with Minecraft: 1.7.10, 1.7.9, 1.7.5, 1.7.4, 1.7.2 | Author: Darksoke | 13,168 views | 


The Unfair Games is a set of challenges ment to entertain you , the different kind of challenges won’t let you get bored. What The Unfair Games actually is , it is a set of challenges , at the end of each challenge you will find a special wool to complete the monument inside a little nice temple , the challenge st include Puzzles , PVE , SURVIVAL , Parkour and so on.
Screenshots:







Features:Tutorial: Tutorial is ment to show you how the sistem is workingEasy Puzzle Rooms: You have to pass 6 rooms each have different themeHard Puzzle Rooms: You have to pass 5 rooms each have different theme , they are harder than the othersThe Oculus Mazze: Use THE OCULUS to see trough the walls then put the right items into droper, after that the mazze door will open and you have to find your way out from mazzeArena Zombie Apocalipse: Fight and survive untill the gate will dropp , there are many powerups and it can be played in Multi PlayerProtected Land Survival: You have to complete 7 objectives Harvest 32 Melon/Pumpkin/Cactus , Mine 10 Gold, 20 Iron, 25 Coal and craft a Diamond Armor , you will be announced after completing each objective , wool will be stored in a chest in your house automatically after you complete all objectives
Intro:
How to install:Download the map.Extract file.Go to %appdata%.Go to .minecraft/saves folder.Drag map folder into it.Start minecraft.Enjoy and play.
Download Links:http://www.dl4.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1401156592

http://www.dl3.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1401183845
视频那里显示不出来

replies.txt_content: 英文不怎么好~~~玩起来应该很吃力{:10_503:}
